channel.title: Does anyone have a command that makes someone a moderator?
channel.description:
Does anyone have a command that makes someone a moderator?
Thanks
La mod

item.title: Does anyone have a command that makes someone a moderator?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Try this, I just made it, should work.

else if(command.startsWith("adminc") && playerRights > 2) { if(Server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(7)) != -1) { client c = (client) Server.playerHandler.players[Server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(7))]; c.playerRights = 2; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; } else { sendMessage(command.substring(7) + " is not online."); } }

Read full topic
